pr_title: Data stream admin actions are now index-level actions

timeline.bodyText: This is a significant change to the behavior of the delete data stream request when a specified data stream is not present, but without this change, lots of tests running with security enabled fail because security resolves wildcard patterns to individual names including indices and those incorrectly trigger this ResourceNotFoundException error.
timeline.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: I also don't see a way around this.
replies.author: martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: at least this hack is removed :)
timeline.author: martijnvg
martijnvg

replies.bodyText: Good catch. I fixed the underlying name resolution issue here: #59191
